modName: Animation Tools N2 - edit TRI files
summary: This tools allow you to create/modify morphs in TRI files.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=yellow]Example: what you can do with this tools[/color][/b]
[youtube]TNnz4rvYYuY[/youtube]

[u][b]Description:[/b][/u]
This tools allow you to create/modify morphs in TRI files.

[b][color=yellow] !!! Any 3D modelling software are supported !!! [/color][/b] :)

[b][color=yellow]To extract from TRI file[/color][/b] all morphs - type at console:
[color=lightblue]_ "TriExtractor.exe Head.tri"[/color]

So, you get base model and all its morphs in common OBJ files.
(and a list of all morphs in TXT file)

Now you can load you favorite 3D editor and change shape of any morph.

[b][color=yellow]To create new TRI file[/color][/b] from existed OBJs - type at console:
[color=lightblue]_ "TriCreator.exe MorphsList.txt"[/color]

(The first line in "MorphsList.txt" is always must be a name of base model for the morphs.)

And this is it. Happy modelling ! :)


[u][b]Licence:[/b][/u]
Do what you want with this tools just give me a proper credits

[u][b]Credits:[/b][/u]
kapaer for info about TRI file format
akba for point me to kapaer's work
Microsoft for Visual C++ Express 2010
Bethesda for the game
author: Anton

- removed all warning about absence of normals
